message.name: ERR_ADMINCONCERNROLE_FV_USERNAME_EMPTY
message.locale: The user name must be specified.

message.name: ERR_ADMINCONCERNROLE_FV_USERNAME_SAME
message.locale: This user is already the current owner for this client.

message.name: ERR_ADMINCONCERNROLE_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_CREATE
message.locale: New administrator details cannot be added for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate.

message.name: ERR_ADMINCONCERNROLE_XRV_ORGOBJECT_SAME
message.locale: This '%1c' is already the current owner for this client.
